metadata.name: Breathe #1/33
metadata.description:
Yet another time, I met again the eyes that caries the saddest look in the whole wide world, the eyes that are the safest place for me.

It is safe because it has always been waiting, and it is sad because it has been lost for a long long time... 
I have come to you, at this moment, my heart is filled with A deep sense of nostalgia, I was longing for our long-lost love 
For the love, that is within you 
For the love, that is rooted deep in my heart  
For the love, is the whole meaning of our existence...
